page_content: The page provides tax forms and guidelines, including a mention of the Steuersoftware BalTax.
The page discusses organizational processes and responsibilities for Geobasis data according to federal and cantonal law.
The page provides information on the Swisslos Sport Fund for sports and physical activity promotion in the Canton of Basel-Stadt.
The page provides information about the five state-run high schools in the Canton of Basel-Stadt, focusing on their educational objectives and curriculum.
The page provides a guide on the formalities and options for burials in Basel.
The page outlines three implementation options for large energy consumers to comply with legal regulations in Basel-Stadt.
The page offers safety guidelines for swimming in the Rhein, including recommended areas and warnings about dangerous zones.
